name: The Cat and Witch's Autumn
description:
[Autumn Game Jam Submission #GreatAutumnGameJam2021]

A short visual novel made for the Autumn Game Jam!

Read the thoughts of a Pumpkitty and help make a few decisions for it! Join Witch and the Pumpkitty in a day of fall in Erma Luna.

Play TIme: 5-15 mins.

Credits:

Character and Bg Art: Riri

Writing/Coding: moonish

Music:

"Moonlight Hall" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
